Main Street", "address2": "", "city": "Belvidere", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61008", "country": null, "phone": "815-544-3892", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "42.2572606", "longitude": "-88.8373284", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Since 2020, we have used the mobile food pick-up method.  After calling and verifying Boone County residence, clients can drive up and have the groceries placed in car.", "notes": "Our food pantry is held on the first Wednesday of each month between the hours of 9am-1130am.  We do, however, provide emergency food baskets throughout the month, Monday thru Thursday 8a-4:30p.  We are closed each day for lunch from 12pm-1pm.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "815-544-3892", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Wednesday 9:15 AM-11:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
